meaningMnemonic: You've seen the word 楽しい, which means "fun." This is obviously very similar looking, though this one means <vocabulary>looking forward to</vocabulary>. Why? Because it has a み on the end, saying "who is going to have fun? It's <reading>me</reading>! That's why I'm looking forward to it!"
readingMnemonic: The reading is just like 楽しい, so make sure you know that and you'll be able to read this one as well.
